name: 馬尚智
objective:
1. Introduction
2. Linear block codes 
3. Cyclic codes 
4. Convolutional codes 
5. Coded modulation
schedule:
I. Introduction (1st wk)
II. Linear block codes (2nd wk ~ 5th wk)
1.　　Maximum likelihood decoding
2.　　Standard array
3.　　Syndrome decoding
4.　　Hamming codes
5.　　Reed-Muller codes
III. Cyclic codes (6th wk ~ 11th wk)
1.　　Introduction to algebra
2.　　Encoding
3.　　Error-trapping decoding
4.　　BCH codes
IV. Convolutional codes (12th wk ~ 15th wk)
1.　　Structural properties
2.　　Distance properties
3.　　The Viterbi algorithm
V. Coded modulation (16th wk ~ 18th wk)
1.　　Set partitioning
2.　　Block coded modulation
3.　　Multistage decoding
4.　　Trellis coded modulaion
materials: Error Control Coding, 2nd edition, Shu Lin and Daniel J. Costello, Jr.
